turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Cut their goddamn heads off. Every one of them. That's what we're doing in California.

turns.speaker: DA
turns.text: WHAT?

turns.speaker: DA
turns.text: Hell, no. We'd never hear the goddamn end of it.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Dobermans don't talk.

turns.speaker: DA
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: DA
turns.text: I'm a whiskey man myself. We don't have much trouble from drugs where I come from...

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: You will. One of these nights you'll wake up and find a junkie tearing your bedroom apart.

turns.speaker: DA
turns.text: Naw!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: They'll climb right into your bedroom and sit on your chest with big Bowie knives. They might even sit on your wife's chest. Put the blade right down on her throat.

turns.speaker: DA
turns.text: Not down in my parts.

turns.speaker: DA
turns.text: What happened? What did they do to her?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Do? Jesus Christ, man. They chopped her goddamn head off right there in the parking lot! Then they cut all kinds of holes in her head and sucked out the blood!

turns.speaker: DA
turns.text: And nobody did anything?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Yeh. The big guy used to be a major in the Marines.

turns.speaker: DA
turns.text: A major!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: We know where he lives, but we can't get near the house.

turns.speaker: DA
turns.text: Naw! Not a major.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: He wanted the pineal gland.

turns.speaker: DA
turns.text: Really?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: That's how he got so big. When he quit the Marines he was just a little guy.

turns.speaker: DA
turns.text: Hell, I really hate to hear this. Because everything that happens in California seems to get down our way, sooner or later. Mostly Atlanta. But that was back when the goddamn bastards were peaceful. All we had to do was to keep 'em under surveillance. They didn't roam around much... But now Jesus, it seems nobody's safe.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: You're going to need to take the bull by the horns -- go to the mat with this scum.

turns.speaker: DA
turns.text: What do you mean by that?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: You know what I mean. We've done it before and we can damn well do it again!

turns.speaker: PROPRIETOR
turns.text: Where ya comin' from, young man?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Las Vegas.

turns.speaker: PROPRIETOR
turns.text: A great town, that Vegas. I bet you had good luck there. You're the type.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: I know. I'm a triple Scorpio.

turns.speaker: PROPRIETOR
turns.text: That's a fine combination. You can't lose.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Oh, my God!...

turns.speaker: PROPRIETOR
turns.text: This is my granddaughter...

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Don't worry...  ...and I'm actually the District Attorney from Ignoto County.  Just another good American like yourself.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: I want you to understand that this man at the wheel is my attorney! He's not just some dingbat I found on the Strip. He's a foreigner. I think he's probably Samoan. But it doesn't matter, does it? Are you prejudiced?

turns.speaker: HITCHHIKER
turns.text: Hell, no!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: I didn't think so. Because in spite of his race, this man is extremely valuable to me. Hell, I forgot all about this beer. You want one?  How about some ether?

turns.speaker: HITCHHIKER
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Never mind. Let's get right to the heart of this thing. Twenty-four hours ago we were sitting in the Pogo Lounge of the Beverly Wills Hotel...

turns.speaker: HITCHHIKER
turns.text: Thanks for the ride. Thanks a lot. I like you guys. Don't worry about me.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Wait a minute! Come back and have a beer!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: "One toke over the line, sweet Jesus."

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: One toke. You poor fool. Wait till you see those goddamn bats.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: We're your friends. We're not like the others.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: No more of that talk or I'll put the leeches on you.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: If so -- well, we'll just have to cut his head off and bury him somewhere. Because it goes without saying that we can't turn him loose. He'd report us at once to some kind of outback Nazi law enforcement agency, and they'll run us down like dogs...

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Jesus! Did I say that?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Or just think it? Was I talking? Did they hear me?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: It's okay. He's admiring the shape of your skull.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: God hell! I think I see the pattern! This one sounds like real trouble! You're going to need plenty of legal advice before this thing is over. As your attorney I must advise you that you'll need a very fast car with no top and after that, the cocaine. And then the tape recorder, for special music, and some Acapulco shirts...  This blows my weekend, because naturally I'll have to go with you -- and we'll have to arm ourselves.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Why not? If a thing's worth doing, it's worth doing right.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: I tell you, my man. This is the American Dream in action! We'd be fools not to ride this strange torpedo all the way to the end.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Indeed. We must do it. What kind of story is this?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: O.K., O.K., yes. Hang onto it. We'll be there in thirty minutes.  I finally located a car with adequate horsepower and the proper coloring.  What?! OF COURSE the gentleman has a major credit card! Do you realize who the fuck you're talking to?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Don't take any guff from these swine.  Now we need a sound store with the finest equipment. Nothing dinky. One of those new Belgian Heliowatts with a voice-activated shotgun mike, for picking up conversations in oncoming cars.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: We won't make the nut unless we have unlimited credit.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: We will. You Samoans are all the same. You have no faith in the essential decency of the white man's culture.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: ...and we're chock full of that!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Damn right!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: My attorney understands this concept, despite his racial handicap. But do you?!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: He said he understood, but I could see in his eyes that he didn't. He was lying to me.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: My heart!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Where's the medicine?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: The medicine? Yes, it's right here.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Turn up the fucking music! My heart feels like an alligator! Volume! Clarity! Bass! We must have bass! What's wrong with us? Are you goddamn old ladies?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: You scurvy shyster bastard! Watch your language! You're talking to a Doctor of Journalism!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: What the fuck are we doing out here? Somebody call the police! We need help!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Pay no attention to this swine. He can't handle the medicine.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: The truth is we're going to Vegas to croak a scag baron named Savage Henry. I've known him for years but he ripped us off -- and you know what that means, right?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Savage Henry has cashed his check! We're going to rip his lungs out!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: And eat them! That bastard won't get away with this! What's going on in this country when a scum sucker like that can get away with sandbagging a Doctor of Journalism?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Oh, Jesus! Did you see what god just did to us?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: God didn't do that! You did it! You're a fucking narcotics agent, that was our cocaine, you pig!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: You better be careful. Plenty of vultures out here. They'll pick your bones clean before morning.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: You whore!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: How long do I have?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Maybe thirty more minutes. As your attorney, I advise you to drive at top speed. It'll be a goddamn miracle if we can get there before you turn into a wild animal. Are you ready for that? Checking into a Vegas hotel under a phony name with intent to commit capital fraud and a head full of acid.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Thirty minutes. It was going to be very close.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Two Cuba Libres with beer and mescal on the side.  Who's Lacerda, he's waiting for us in a room on the twelfth floor?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Lacerda?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: I was right in the middle of a fucking reptile zoo. And somebody was giving booze to these goddamn things! It won't be long before they tear us to shreds!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: If you think we're in trouble now wait until you see what's happening in the elevators.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: I just went upstairs to see this man Lacerda. I told him I knew what he was up to...  He says he's a photographer! But when I mentioned Savage Henry he freaked! He knows we're onto him!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: But what about our room? And the golf shoes?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: That's the press table. Where you have to sign in for our credentials. Shit, let's get it over with. You handle that, and I'll check on the room.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: No, no. Don't leave me!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Shoot it.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Not yet. I want to study its habits.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: What are you talking about?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: You bastard! They'll never let us back in that place. I leave you alone for three minutes and you start waving that goddamn marlin spike around -- yelling about reptiles! You scared the shit out of those people! They were ready to call the cops. Hell, the only reason they gave us press passes was to get you out of there...

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: That's good...

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: I think he's lying to us. I could see it in his eyes.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: They'll probably have a big net for us when we show up.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Total control now. Tooling along the main drag on a Saturday night in Vegas, two good old boys in a fire apple red convertible... stoned, ripped, twisted... Good people!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: How about "Nickel Nick's Slot Arcade?" "Hot Slots," that sounds heavy. Twenty- nine cent hotdogs...

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Look, what are we doing here? Are we here to entertain ourselves, or to do the job?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: To do the job, of course. Here we go... a Crab Louie and quart of muscatel for twenty dollars!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Why?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Why what?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Holy shit! They almost had us there! That was quick thinking.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: What do you expect? I'm your attorney. You owe me five bucks. I want it now.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Jesus creeping shit!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Did the mescaline just kick in? Or was that Debbie Reynolds in a silver Afro wig?!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: We wandered into a fucking time capsule!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: This is the place. They'll never fuck with us here.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Where's the ether? This mescaline isn't working.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Some angry Rotarian shoves you and you think: What's happening here? What's going on? Then you hear yourself mumbling.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Dogs fucked the Pope, no fault of mine. Watch out!... Why money? My name is Brinks; I was born... Born?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Get sheep over side... women and children to armored car... orders from Captain Zeep.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: I hate to say this, but this place is getting to me. I think I'm getting The Fear.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Nonsense. We came here to find the American Dream, and now we're right in the vortex you want to quit. You must realize that we've found the Main Nerve.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: That's what gives me The Fear.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Look over there. Two women fucking a Polar Bear.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Please, don't tell me those things... Not now.  This is my last drink. How much money can you lend me?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Not much. Why?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: I have to go.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: GO?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Yes. Leave the country. Tonight.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Calm down. You'll be straight in a few hours.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: No. This is serious. One more hour in this town and I'll kill somebody!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: OK. I'll lend you some money. Let's go outside and see how much we have left.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Can we make it?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: That depends on how many people we fuck with between here and the door.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: I want to leave fast.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: OK. Lets pay this bill and get up very slowly. It's going to be a long walk.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Do they pay you to screw that bear?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: When does this thing stop?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: It won't stop. It's not ever going to stop.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Did you see that? Some sonofabitch kicked me in the back.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Probably the bartender. He wanted to stomp you for what you said to the waitress.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Good God! Let's get out of here! Where's the elevator?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Don't go near that elevator. That's just what they want us to do... trap us in a steel box and take us down to the basement.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Don't run. They'd like any excuse to shoot us.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: You drive! I think there's something wrong with me.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Yeah... I thought we might need it...

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: What for?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Let's go up there and blast him out of bed with the fire hose.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: No, we should leave the poor bastard alone. I get the feeling that he's avoiding us for some reason.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Don't kid yourself. That Portuguese son of a bitch is dangerous. He's watching us like a hawk.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: He told me he was turning in early...

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: That dirty bastard! I knew it! He's got hold of my woman!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: That little blonde groupie with the film crew? You think he sodomized her?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: That's right, laugh about it! You goddamn honkies are all the same!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Where'd you get that knife?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Room service sent it up. I wanted something to cut the limes.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: What limes?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: They didn't have any. They don't grow in the desert.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Have you made a deal with him? Did you put him on to her?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Look you better put that blade away and get your head straight. I have to put the car in the lot.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: You evil son of a bitch. You better hope there's some Thorazine in that bag, because if there's not, you're in bad trouble.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Music! Turn it up. Put that tape on.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: What tape?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Jefferson Airplane. "White Rabbit." I want a rising sound.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: You're doomed. I'm leaving here in two hours and then they're going to come up here and beat the mortal shit out of you with big saps. Right there in that tub.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: I dig my own graves. Green water and the White Rabbit. Put it on.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: OK. But do me one last favor, will you. Can you give me two hours? That's all I ask -- just two hours to sleep before tomorrow. I suspect it's going to be a very difficult day.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Of course, I'm your attorney, I'll give you all the time you need, at my normal rates: $45 an hour -- but you'll be wanting a cushion, so, why don't you just lay one of those $100 bills down there beside the radio, and fuck off?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: How about a check?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Whatever's right.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: I want that fucking radio!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Don't touch it! Get back in that tub!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Back the tape up. I need it again! Let it roll! Just as high as the fucker can go! And when it comes to that fantastic note where the rabbit bites its own head off, I want you to THROW THAT FUCKING RADIO INTO THE TUB WITH ME!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Not me. It would blast you through the wall -- stone dead in ten seconds and they'd make me explain it!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: BULLSHIT! Don't make me use this.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Jesus.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Do it! I want to get HIGHER!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Fuck yes. I was beginning to think I was going to have to go out and get one of the goddamn maids to do it.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Are you ready?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: You bastard! You'd do that, wouldn't you?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Why worry? You'll like it. Nothing in the world like a Mace high. Forty- five minutes on your knees with the dry heaves...

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: You cheap honky sonofabitch...

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Why not? Hell, just a minute ago, you were asking me to kill you! And now you want to kill me! What I should do, goddamnit, is call the police!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: The cops?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: There's no choice. I wouldn't dare go to sleep with you wandering around with a head full of acid and wanting to slice me up with that goddamn knife!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Who said anything about slicing you up? I just wanted to carve a little Z on your forehead. Nothing serious.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: You bastard! I need a lawyer immediately!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: What are you doing in Baker? Didn't you get my telegram?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: What? Fuck telegrams. I'm in trouble. You worthless bastard. I'll cripple your ass for this! All that shit in the car is yours! You understand that? When I finish testifying out here you'll be disbarred!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: You're supposed to be in Vegas. We have a suite at the Flamingo. I was just about to leave for the airport.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: You degenerate pig!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: It can't be helped. This is Lucy.  You know -- like "Lucy In The Sky With Diamonds."

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: WELL? What are your plans?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Plans?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Lucy.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Shit. I met her on the plane and I had all that acid.  You know, those little blue barrels. I gave her a cap before I realized... she's a religious freak... Jesus, she's never even had a drink.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Well... It'll probably work out. We can keep her loaded and peddle her ass at the drug convention.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Listen, she's running away from home for something like the fifth time in six months. It's terrible.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: She's perfect for this gig. These cops will go fifty bucks a head to beat her into submission and then gang fuck her. We can set her up in one of these back street motels, hang pictures of Jesus all over the room, then turn these pigs loose on her... Hell she's strong; she'll hold her own.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Jesus Christ. I knew you were sick but I never expected to hear you actually say that kind of stuff.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: It's straight economics. This girl is a god-send. Shit, she can make us a grand a day.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: NO! Stop talking like that.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: I figure she can do about four at a time. Christ, if we keep her full of acid that's more like two grand a day. Maybe three.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: You filthy bastard. I should cave your fucking head in.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: In a few hours, she'll probably be sane enough to work herself into a towering Jesus-based rage at the hazy recollection of being seduced by some kind of cruel Samoan who fed her liquor and LSD, dragged her to a Vegas hotel room and savagely penetrated every orifice in her body with his throbbing, uncircumcised member.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: NO! I felt sorry for the girl, I wanted to help her!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: You'll go straight to the gas chamber. And even if you manage to beat that, they'll send you back to Nevada for Rape and Consentual Sodomy. She's got to go.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: The only alternative was to take her out to the desert and feed her remains to the lizards. But, it seemed a bit heavy for the thing we were trying to protect: My attorney.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: We have to cut her loose. She's got two hundred dollars. And we can always call the cops up there in Montana, where she lives, and turn her in.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: What?... What kind of goddamn monster are you?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: It just occurred to me, that she has no witnesses. Anything that she says about us is completely worthless.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Us?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Okay, Lucy, it's time to go meet Barbra...

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: I felt like a Nazi, but it had to be done.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: I gave the cabbie an extra ten bucks to make sure she gets there safe. Also, I told him I'd be there myself in an hour, and if she wasn't, I'd come back out here and rip his lungs out.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: That's good. You can't be subtle in this town.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: As your attorney, I advise you to tell me where you put the goddamn mescaline.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Maybe we should take it easy tonight.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Right. Let's find a good seafood restaurant and eat some red salmon. I feel a powerful lust for red salmon...

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: I saw these bastards in Easy Rider, but I didn't believe they were real. Not like this. Not hundreds of them!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: They're actually nice people when you get to know them.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Man, I know these people in my goddamn blood!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Don't mention that word around here. You'll get them excited.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: This is a fucking nightmare.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Right. Sure as hell some dope-dealing bomb freak is going to recognize you and put the word out that you're partying with a thousand cops.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Read the newspapers.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Man, you don't know trouble until you have to face down a bunch of these addicts gone crazy for human sacrifice!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Hell, in Malibu alone, these goddamn Satan worshippers kill six or eight people every day. All they want is the blood. They'll take people right off the street if they have to.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Just the other day we had a case where they grabbed a girl right out of a McDonald's hamburger stand. She was a waitress, about sixteen years old... with a lot of people watching, too!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: What could they do? The guy that took the head was about six-seven, and maybe three-hundred pounds. He was packing two Lugers, and the others had M-16s.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: They just ran back out into Death Valley -- you know, where Manson turned up...

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Like big lizards.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: ...and every one of them stacked naked...

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Yeh, naked!... except for the weapons.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: They were all veterans.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: What's wrong with you? Hell, somebody has to do it.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Hurry up with those drinks. We're thirsty. Only two rums. Make mine a Bloody Mary.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Sure. It's all on the Q.T., but everybody who matters is with us all the way down the line.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: We keep it quiet. It's not the kind of thing you'd want to talk about upstairs. Not with the press around.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Sometimes it's easier to just rip out the backstraps.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: They'll fight like hell if you try to take the head without the dogs.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Good work.  They'll treat us like goddamn lepers after that.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Lucy is looking for you.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: No, she's looking for you.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Me?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: She really flipped over you. The only way I could get rid of her was by saying you were taking me out to the desert for a showdown -- that you wanted me out of the way so you could have her all to yourself.  I guess she figures you won. That phone message wasn't for me, was it?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: OK, goddamnit!... Look... I'll call her. I'll get her off our backs. You're right. She's my problem.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: It's gone too far.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Relax. Let me handle this.  You'd make a piss-poor lawyer... Room 1600, please.  As your attorney, I advise you not to worry.  Take a hit out of that little brown bottle in my shaving kit.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: What is this?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: You won't need much. Just a little tiny taste, that stuff makes pure mescaline seem like ginger-beer. Adrenochrome.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Adrenochrome...

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Hi, Lucy?  Yeah, it's me. I got your message... what? Hell, no, I taught the bastard a lesson he'll never forget... what?  No, not dead, but he won't be bothering anybody for a while. Yeah. I left him out there, I stomped him, then pulled all his teeth out...

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: I remember thinking, "Jesus, what a terrible thing to lay on somebody with a head full of acid."

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: I remember slumping on the bed, his performance had given me a bad jolt. For a moment I thought his mind had snapped -- that he actually believed he was being attacked by invisible enemies. But the room was quiet again.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Where'd you get this?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Never mind, it's absolutely pure.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Jesus... what kind of monster client have you picked up this time? There's only one source for this stuff -- the adrenaline gland from a living human body!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: I know, but the guy didn't have any cash to pay me. He's one of these Satanism freaks. He offered me human blood -- said it would take me higher than I've ever been in my life.  I thought he was kidding, so I told him I'd just as soon have an ounce or so of pure adrenochrome -- or maybe just a fresh adrenaline gland to chew on.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: I could already feel the stuff working on me -- the first wave felt like a combination of mescaline and methedrine -- maybe I should take a swim, I thought...

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Why not? We should get some of that. Just eat a big handful and see what happens.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Some of what?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Extract of pineal!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Sure. That's a good idea. One whiff of that shit would turn you into something out of a goddamn medical encyclopedia.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Man, your head would swell up like a watermelon, you'd probably gain about a hundred pounds in two hours...

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Right!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: ...grow claws... bleeding warts.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Yes!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: ...then you'd notice about six huge hairy tits swelling up on your back...

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Man I'll try about anything; but I'd never touch a pineal gland.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: FINISH THE FUCKING STORY! What happened?! What about the glands?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: So do we, lady.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: I think we should put her on the payroll. See what she comes up with.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Do you think you can handle it?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Alright, Alice... you'll be contacted by Inspector Rock. Arthur Rock. He'll be posing as a politician.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Inspector Rock will pay you. In cash. A thousand dollars on the ninth of every month.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Fuck the car. They should make these things with a goddamn FM radio.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Yeh... This foreign made crap -- is sucking our dollar balance dry!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: There was nothing in the atmosphere of the North Star to put me on my guard...

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Two glasses of ice water with ice.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: I was stupid with shock -- not knowing whether to run or start laughing.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: How much is the lemon meringue pie?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Her eyes were turgid with fear, but her brain was functioning on some basic motor survival level.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: What are you doing? You were supposed to turn back there!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: We had abused every rule that Vegas lived by -- burning the locals, abusing the tourists, terrifying the help. The only chance now, I felt, was the possibility that we'd gone to such excess that nobody in the position to bring the hammer down on us could possibility believe it.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: The airport is over there!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Never missed a plane yet.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: No! I can't get out! They'll crucify me. I'll have to take the blame!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Ridiculous! Just say you were hitchhiking to the airport and I picked you up. You never saw me before. Shit, this town is full of white Cadillac convertibles. I plan to go through there so fast that nobody will even glimpse the goddamn license plate. You ready?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Why not? But for Christ's sake, just do it fast!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Don't take any guff from those swine. Remember, if you have any trouble you can always send a telegram to the Right People.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Yeah... Explaining my Position. Some asshole wrote a poem about that once...

turns.speaker: MAID
turns.text: Please... please... I'm only the maid. I didn't mean nothin!...

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: YOU'RE UNDER ARREST!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: What made you do it? Who paid you off?

turns.speaker: MAID
turns.text: Nobody. I'm the maid!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: The dope ring. You must know what's going on in this hotel. Why do you think we're here?

turns.speaker: MAID
turns.text: I know you're cops, but I thought you were just here for that convention. I swear! All I wanted to do was clean up the room. I don't know anything about dope!

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Maybe she's telling the truth. Maybe she's not part of it.

turns.speaker: MAID
turns.text: No! I swear I'm not!

turns.speaker: MAID
turns.text: You'd pay me for that?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: You're damn right. But the first time you say anything about this, to anybody -- you'll go straight to prison for the rest of your life. What's your name?

turns.speaker: MAID
turns.text: Alice. Just ring Linen Service and ask for Alice.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: The password is: "One Hand Washes The Other." The minute you hear that, you say "I fear nothing."

turns.speaker: MAID
turns.text: I fear nothing.

turns.speaker: HIGHWAY PATROLMAN
turns.text: May I see your license.

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Of course, officer.

turns.speaker: HIGHWAY PATROLMAN
turns.text: Could I have that, please?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Why not? It was getting warm anyway.

turns.speaker: HIGHWAY PATROLMAN
turns.text: You realize...

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: Yeah. I know. I'm guilty. I understand that. I knew it was a crime but I did it anyway. Shit, why argue? I'm a fucking criminal.

turns.speaker: HIGHWAY PATROLMAN
turns.text: That's a strange attitude.

turns.speaker: HIGHWAY PATROLMAN
turns.text: You know -- I get the feeling you could use a nap. There's a rest area up ahead. Why don't you pull over and sleep a few hours?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: A nap won't help. I've been awake for too long -- three or four nights. I can't even remember. If I go to sleep now, I'm dead for twenty hours.

turns.speaker: HIGHWAY PATROLMAN
turns.text: Okay. Here's how it is. What goes into my book, as of noon, is that I apprehended you... for driving too fast, and advised you to proceed no further than the next rest area... your stated destination, right? Where you plan to take a long nap. Do I make myself clear?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: How far is Baker? I was hoping to stop there for lunch.

turns.speaker: HIGHWAY PATROLMAN
turns.text: Not my jurisdiction. The city limits are two point two miles beyond the rest area. Can you make it that far?

turns.speaker: DUKE
turns.text: I'll try. I've been wanting to go to Baker for a long time. I've heard a lot about it.

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: You're lying! You were after the evidence. Who put you up to this -- the manager?

turns.speaker: MAID
turns.text: I don't know what you're talking about!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Bullshit! You're just as much a part of it as they are!

turns.speaker: MAID
turns.text: Part of what?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: Come on, baby don't try to tell us you never heard of the Grange Gorman.

turns.speaker: MAID
turns.text: No! No! I swear to Jesus I never heard of that stuff!

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: In that case, maybe she can help.

turns.speaker: MAID
turns.text: Yes! I'll help you all you need! I hate dope!

turns.speaker: MAID
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: GONZO
turns.text: One phone call every day. Just tell us what you've seen. Don't worry if it doesn't add up, that's our problem.
